text: Bloodbrothers is a 1978 coming of age drama movie directed by Robert Mulligan and starring Richard Gere, Paul Sorvino, Tony Lo Bianco, Marliu Henner, Kenneth McMillan, Robert Englund and Danny Aiello. It was based from the novel of the same name by Richard Price and was distributed by Warner Bros. == Other websites == * Category:1978 drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Coming-of-age drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Mulligan Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:American coming-of-age movies
title: Bloodbrothers (1978 movie)
